title: Saudi Arabia Permits Umrah Using Any Type of Visa
summary: The Saudi Ministry of Hajj and Umrah has affirmed that holders of all types of visas can perform the umrah pilgrimage.

organizations: Saudi Ministry of Hajj and Umrah

affected_groups: holders of all types of visas

key_points: The Saudi Ministry of Hajj and Umrah has affirmed that holders of all types of visas can perform the umrah pilgrimage.
